resources.string: NightRide is a free nighttime shuttle service provided to the UC campus community. It exists to provide safe and reliable transportation to and from locations within a one mile radius around the UC campus. Similar to a cab company, students, faculty and staff can call NightRide to pick them up and take them to and from places on and off campus.
Sunday - Wednesday: 8 p.m. to Midnight \n Thursday - Saturday: 8 p.m. to 2 a.m.
GPS must be enabled\n to request a ride.\n Would you like to enable now?
